mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed set iuser =#{iuser}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed, B.iuser AS writerIuser, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt, IF(C.ifeed >0, 1, 0) AS isFav FROM t_feed AS A JOIN t_user AS B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_favorite AS C ON A.ifeed = C.ifeed and C.iuser = #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
